EmailTemplate.name: CPP - Setup Complete
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Account.Name} is live!
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Hello, The {!Account.Name}, is now live. Please reach out to our CPP to have them review the site. CPP Partner: {!Account.Channel_Development__c} Account Name: {!Account.Name} Client ID: {!Account.Client_ID__c} Thank you. Partner CS Operations
